snippet: Mr. Ellis, a center, was on the outstanding St. John’s teams of the early 1960s and went on to win an N.B.A. championship with the Lakers in 1972.
abstract: LeRoy Ellis, star center at St John's University and NBA star who played on the 1971-72 Los Angeles Lakers championship team, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ellis, a center, was on the outstanding St. John’s teams of the early 1960s and went on to win an N.B.A. championship with the Lakers in 1972.

headline.seo: LeRoy Ellis, Star With St. John’s and N.B.A.’s Lakers, Dies at 72
headline.main: LeRoy Ellis, a Star Big Man at St. John’s, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: LeRoy Ellis, 72, a Star Big Man at St. John’s
